com.ibm.jikes.skij.misc
Class Adaptor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.jikes.skij.Environment
        |
        +--com.ibm.jikes.skij.ProcEnvironment
              |
              +--com.ibm.jikes.skij.misc.Adaptor
public class Adaptor
extends ProcEnvironment

This utility class is intended to allow users to package up Skij structure in the guise of a Java object that has its own methods. Those methods can be defined by Skij callbacks. So far, toString is the only method implemented, but it's easy to add more. For an example of use, see lib/tree.scm.
